Plain Flour 2 cup 

Yeast 1 tsp 

Egg 2 pc 

Icing Sugar 1 cup 

Almonds ½ cup 

Black Cumin seeds ½ tsp 

Butter 2-3 tbsp 

Baking Powder 1 tsp 

Olive Oil 2 tsp 

Salt 1 pinch

1. In a pan, Luke warm water and add yeast. Mix it well. 

2. When yeast is done then add it in mixing bowl, add icing sugar, edd, plain flour, black cumin seeds, baking powder, olive oil and salt. 

3. Now knead dough and wrap it in plastic and leave it at hot atmosphere for 2 to 3 hours. 

4. Now knead it and make balls as required with the help of rolling pan roll it and cut thin sticks. 

5. Now mix 2 rolls together and make rest of others like it with the help of brush add egg and almonds. 

6. Grease baking tray with butter or oil and place bread on it. Then brush bread with olive oil. 

7. Bake it in oven for 15 to 20 minutes. Serve it.
